website_summaries.verdict: The cute glow-in-the-dark design means no more nighttime searches for the pacifier.
pros: Glow-in-the-dark makes it easy to find in the dark
Maintains a light glow even when not fully charged
Orthodontic nipple design promotes healthy development of palate, gums, and teeth
cons: Some babies don't like the nipple shape

customer_reviews.title: Water gets trapped inside nipple.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to try it out since my newborn despises the soothie pacifier we got at the hospital. Much to my surprise, she loved this one! I was extremely relieved and happy. Unfortunately, it took me an hour to realize (after she fell asleep with it it on and I took it out once she was completely out), that there was water/saliva being trapped inside of the nipple. This is a safety hazard as it can cause mold, create bacteria and cause my daughter to suck on soapy water if I wash it with mild soap (as advised on the instructions). I will be returning it, and then go back on a hunt for a paci she will like...
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Frozen pacifiers work great!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I initially bought these so my daughter could use them daily BUT she only likes the newborn sizes. I decided to use these to freeze for when she is teething (since the gel teether safe cold on her hands and she doesn't like that) and these work great as a hands free teether! I just squeeze them underwater so they fill up with water and keep them in the freezer for when she needs them! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sf87

customer_reviews.title: Stays in mouth!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to switch my 3 month old to from soothies because they would just fall out of his mouth. These STAY in unless he actually spots them out. There is a warning about water or spit getting inside the nipple but I have not had that problem. My only complaint is they don't glow unless in direct sunlight so if you leave them in a crib or bassinet, they won't glow at night. They are also basically crystal clear in color so very hard to find during the day! I wish the small sizes came in brighter colors.
customer_reviews.author: NebraskaMamaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: One more good review for a simple pacifier.
customer_reviews.text: We tried so many pacifiers before Mam and none of them were successful as Mam. When a friend of mine told me ”your baby will choose the pacifier and you will end up so many useless pacifiers in your hand” I laughed. But it is so true. Now I have so many useless pacifiers. This one is for the night, it glows. We have more for the day time. Basically, start with this one and don't end up so so many useless pacifiers. Edit: Solution for trapped water, you need to clean it while nipple part squeezed.
customer_reviews.author: Simbel Ayse

customer_reviews.title: The best pacifiers
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite pacifiers for infants under 6 months. They are small and fit in their mouth better. I know everyone goes for the soothies but my son kept spitting it out and losing it so I tried these. Have 3 sets of 2 that I keep all over the house and in my diaper bag. Also bonus that they glow in the dark!! Makes it so I can easily find it in the crib during the night without turning the light on. For all those middle of the night wake ups where you just need to pop the pacifier back in! Genius!
customer_reviews.author: KKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Glow in the dark=more sleep for baby and parents
customer_reviews.text: Glow in the dark = fast & easy to locate Finding sucky fast = baby sleeping longer/staying asleep -It does glow in a dark room after being exposed to a reasonable amount of light -Doesn't glow so brightly that it keeps baby awake -Whatever chemical makes it glow is in the 'button' part - not the part in baby's mouth -Helps to find lost suckys - just wait till it's dark and go look in car/under bed/outside Verdict: Awesomesauce. My only question is: Why didn't we get these from the start?
customer_reviews.author: Lillyowl

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: These are the only pacifiers my six week old will take. They are the right size for a younger baby who is still getting accustom to the pacifier and has a smaller mouth. The reason for four out of five stars is that the "glow in the dark" function lasts about ten minutes after being charged by light, so it doesn't really serve a purpose seeing as you'd most want this feature when they drop it during sleeping, not right when putting them down.
customer_reviews.author: kikiolymarieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Necessary baby item
customer_reviews.text: You need glow in the dark pacifiers. Imagine it's 3am in the dead of the night and super dark. Your baby starts crying, you're exhausted, and you easily find that glow in the dark pacifier without having to turn on all the lights! Now imagine your baby is a little older and has learned that glowing thing is their pacifier and is able to find it themselves... MIND BLOWN.
customer_reviews.author: KP832

customer_reviews.title: They are great, but...
customer_reviews.text: These glow in the dark and are easy to find at night. I had bought them because of the great reviews but there are a couple of cons. There is no loop to hold them, so they fall easily (out of my hand and out of baby's mouth). My almost 3 week old (6.3 pounds) has gagged on them a couple of times, and I had bought these hoping to avoid that. I had read that the size was not long enough to cause that reaction, so that was my biggest reason for purchase. Unfortunately, since she does gag on them every so often, I will have to try these again when she is older.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: I only buy these glow-in-the-dark pacifiers now. My daughter can find it in her crib if she loses it and she knows it's time to go to sleep when I give it to her. It's so cute because she gets excited when I put it to the light bulb to "charge". I do wish there was a way to take it apart for cleaning because eventually moisture gets inside but when that happens I just buy a new one. They seem to always be out of stock at my Walmart so I appreciate that I can order them online.
customer_reviews.author: RMason

customer_reviews.title: Love the glow in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: Our son accepted pretty much any pacifier when he was first born, but he started to be a little pickier when it was time for him to move to the 6+ month size. After trying about three different kinds, he decided he would only use the 6+ month Mam pacifiers. When I was looking for them online, I ordered the glow in the dark type for fun. I didn't really think about how extremely helpful that would be - no more feeling around the crib hoping that he hadn't thrown the pacifier and you'd have to go searching on the floor. Will definitely buy more when we need them.
customer_reviews.author: happyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Best Pacifiers,but does not glow well
customer_reviews.text: MAM pacifiers are the only type of pacifier my daughter will take. We, unfortunately, did not discover this until after several futile attempts to have our daughter accept the hospital pacifier. However, the glow-in-the-dark feature leaves much to be desired. Yes, they will glow in the dark, but only after being exposed to sunlight and only for a limited time thereafter. I had high hopes that these would glow in the wee hours of the morning when I was hunting for a pacifier my daughter had lost in her sleep. No such luck, but the designs are cute nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Pacifier, but Limited Glow
customer_reviews.text: MAM pacifiers are the only type of pacifier my daughter will take. We, unfortunately, did not discover this until after several futile attempts to have our daughter accept the hospital pacifier. However, the glow-in-the-dark feature leaves much to be desired. Yes, they will glow in the dark, but only after being exposed to sunlight and only for a limited time thereafter. I had high hopes that these would glow in the wee hours of the morning when I was hunting for a pacifier my daughter had lost in her sleep. No such luck, but the designs are cute nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Must have for easy nighttime find ..
customer_reviews.text: These are life savers .. my breastfed baby had nipple confusion with others and will only take this pacifier. I noticed other babies said opposite but they work for us. Can't beat the glowing in the middle of the night I've even use then as a little light to see if baby is still asleep. I use my wife warmer light to make them glow brighter if they dull. they really dont require a whole lot of exposure though!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: No glow
customer_reviews.text: The pacifier themselves are fine. My son uses the mam pacifiers exclusively and they have always held up well. Pictures of them are cute and stand washing without fading. My only problem with these particular pacifiers is they are supposed to glow in the dark and I have yet to see them glow. If I hold them in pitch pitch black I see maybe a slight glow but it's pretty useless for his nightly sleep. They cost the same as the regular ones so it's not that big of a deal but if it's advertised glow it should glow.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: baby can find it in the dark too!
customer_reviews.text: This boasts that the glow in the dark feature helps parents find it in the dark. True. Even better, once your baby is at that age where they can insert their own pacifier, the glow means your baby can find it, too! We put a handful of them in the crib with our baby boy and whenever he wakes and wants one, he doesn't have to work hard to find it. The glow is gentle enough not to keep a baby awake, but bright enough to help baby find one on his own, and he drifts back off to sleep without disturbing us. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Lass

customer_reviews.title: The glow in the dark aspect is perfect!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My breastfed baby loves this pacifier. He took to this brand right away when he was first born. He never had nipple confusion and would easily nurse after using this. I love how cute this design is and it’s the perfect nipple size. The BEST thing about this pacifier is the glow in the dark feature. When I take my glasses off at night I really can’t see much. The glow in the dark is super bright and I can easily find this pacifier!!! It’s a must have in our house. I highly recommend this item and this brand!!
customer_reviews.author: FamilyofLove

customer_reviews.title: The glow is great, my baby doesn’t love this style
customer_reviews.text: The glow is great, but can actually be a little too bright sometimes. I worry that it distracts/stimulates my baby at night. That said, if you’re doing a constant binky dance at night, these help. Unfortunately my baby prefers the Soothie style binky and doesn’t really like these very much. The issue of water getting in the tip is also real and a little disconcerting, although the baby can’t actually get any water that gets trapped, so I don’t think that is a major issue in reality.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pacifier so far
customer_reviews.text: Best paci I have gotten so far. The shape helps it stay in my babies mouth better than others I’ve tried even when she’s sleeping. I like the dip for the nose to breathe well. The glow in the dark works well and will continue to glow through the night if you use a night light, even a dimmed or colored one. The circular bulb like piece in the middle helps me keep it in place when I baby wear her and she has her face on my chest. Also gives a little breathing room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my baby face cheek pinkish.
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this pacifier because when my baby suck on the pacifier, it made his 2 cheek pinkish. Because it is made out of plastic and the 2 side of the pacifier is hard. Also, the 2 side is curved toward the cheek more and it caused my baby to have pinkish cheek when he sucks on it
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lo

customer_reviews.title: Solid binky
customer_reviews.text: These are the Binks we used for my oldest, so it's what we started our newest on. On the one hand, I wish we had used the Phillips ones like the hospital gave because they are cheaper. On the other, they weird me out a bit. The pacifiers themselves are good, they don't fall apart or anything, and the cleaning case is nice. I think every baby is going to have a some sort of preference, but if you can get them to take these you're not making a mistake with the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Found mold/mildew after using for 16 days
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on 9/30/2020 and started using it immediately, it’s now 10/16/2020 and we noticed a black spot forming Inside the pacifier that’s suppose to be sealed, I gave my Kiddo a brand new one and decided to cut it open and I close formed my fears it’s a mildew/mold formation. Idk if this product missed QA or what but it wasn’t sealed completely and thus air/liquids was able to get inside and form this which means the baby was sucking it in as well. Be careful always check and listen for air. Me thinking it was brand new would be fine apparently not
customer_reviews.author: T.Butler

customer_reviews.title: Genius!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old still loves these! I love them because they glow in the dark so I can easily find them in the middle of the night! Genius! Some of the reviews said these only glowed for a little while but I haven’t found that to be the case; they seem to be visible all night! It came in a small plastic case that doubles as a microwaveable sanitizer. I haven’t bothered to use the sanitizing case, I usually just boil in some water for 10 minutes with other teething toys, etc., BUT might be cool for travel! Such a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: chntelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great, could be brighter. Can’t tell which side is up by feel.
customer_reviews.text: This product is good, only two things I would improve is the glow needs to be brighter and the shape should be different on top and bottom so that I can feel which side is up in the dark, when trying to place it in the baby’s mouth. The picture design is hard to figure out in the dark from a couple feet away, so I’d say improve the graphic so I can tell from the outline which is up, then the shape of the shield or button so I can tell just by feel. Ideally both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soap suds and water became trapped in nipple, one pacifier not usable
customer_reviews.text: We have used MAM pacifiers since the beginning and not had any problems, but in this two-pack, one arrived already damaged. When I washed them before first use, one pacifier got soap suds and water trapped inside the nipple, presumably from a tear or breakage I couldn’t identify. The water never drained back out, which made that pacifier unusable. For what it’s worth, I have never had that problem with this brand before and find the pacifiers easy to clean and resilient. I especially like the glow in the dark ones, as they are easier to find in the crib at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Love that it glows in the dark
customer_reviews.text: Whoever thought to put these pacifiers to glow in the dark is a genius. They are a great help to sleepy parents who don’t want to turn on a light to look for the pacifier in the night and wake up the baby. My daughter took them well although these days she prefers her fingers. Water and in my daughter’s case dribble can go into the pacifier but you can easily squeeze it out. I love the little storage case they come in as well. The curved design fit well on her face. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend if your LO has eczema on their face.
customer_reviews.text: My LO loves this pacifier for bedtime. It is very easy to clean and water doesn’t get trapped in the nipple so we loved it too! However he does suffer from bad eczema which we finally got under control a while back. We purchased these pacifiers and after two days of using them his face flared up again and has only gotten worse. We then realized that the pacifiers have these tiny bumps on the backside which must be rubbing and aggravating the area so we have stopped using them and his face cleared back up since.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: My kid really likes them, but the kind for older kids didn’t hold up as well
customer_reviews.text: I got these sizes for older babies since this is the brand my baby likes, but he is getting older and recently turned 1yrs old. In only about a month and a half he has chewed through both of these. So I was disappointed in the quality, as the ones for younger babies are still intact and seem better quality. I will still probably get some since it’s the only brand my kid will use, but I am looking into other options
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Glow in the dark works great
customer_reviews.text: Water gets trapped in them. The glowing feature is nice though. For those that says yours don’t glow, probably don’t know that you need to let them absorb light first. I didn’t know that either. Lol thought they didn’t work until my husband looked at me all crazy and said, “you do know they need to be exposed to light first right?!” Well, although my son decided he didn’t want to use pacifiers anymore after I got these, I at least learned something new 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Vu Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: These are the only ones my son will use.
customer_reviews.text: The thickness is perfect. Not too thick causing choking and hard to breath; not too thin making it easy to fall out. Easy to find in the middle of the night and in dark areas in the day (bottom of the diaper bag or under the sofa). My 6 month old loves to travel now and his pacis end up everywhere. It is easy to clean and easy for him to hold. Plus we love the case they come with. Highly recommend these. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Newborn son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our son favors this pacifier over the regular ones and the one we got at the hospital. It's so easy for him to hold and it only falls out of his mouth when he pushes it out or when he's so deeply asleep that it falls out and doesn't wake him. The glow in the dark only works ok, it lasts about 5 minutes or so, and that's only after a good amount of time in the sun. I do love the sanitizing box it comes in for easy sanitizing in the microwave. We ordered 2 more packs of 2 to have everywhere. I definitely recommend buying multiple packs at once!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Breastfed babies love.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pacifier! It’s the only pacifier my breastfed babies would take. This passy also never messed with their latches. Their is plenty of airways, and I love the glow in the dark design. That allows you to find babies pacifier without turning the lights on. Again, we tried at least 10 other pacifiers and this one is the only one they took to. So I would highly recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: MAM has been the only paci my son would ever take since birth. He is 2 now. I grabbed these one day at the store when I needed more, and I didn’t even realize they were glow in the dark. I think that’s so great. They can easily be found in the crib in the middle of the night. MAM is a great quality product. I have thrown these in the dishwasher to clean and they come out just like new. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Faline Keller

customer_reviews.title: Invisible at night if not glowing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the glow is hype. You have to be sure to expose it to enough light long enough beforehand to glow at night, so if it’s been in the crib, diaper bag, or your pocket, there will be no glow. Because of the nearly clear plastic, this pacifier is effectively INVISIBLE if it’s not glowing. Otherwise it’s a good pacifier, and I like the lack of a handle, which makes it more comfortable for my child when I’m wearing him in a baby carrier facing me. A good cork, but don’t pay extra for invisibility.
customer_reviews.author: Mills

customer_reviews.title: Best pacifier for my breastfeeding baby!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Where the heck have these been this past 2 months?! As soon as I popped this into my son's mouth, he fell asleep. He was tired and wanting to get on my breast again, since I'm breastfeeding him, but I'm tired of being used as a pacifier. The two other pacifiers just weren't for him. He would make a face and didn't want anything to do with them. Until I got these! Omg thank you thank you!! ❤️😁👍
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Flores

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little pacifiers that stays in my little one's mouth and easy for her to latch. I love that it glows in the dark and it allows me to find it in dim light to help her fall back asleep. The cute decorations on them is a plus too! I actually didn't realize that pacifiers come in different sizes (I know... I should have known...) so make sure you purchase the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: swtxtenshi

customer_reviews.title: Great for finding in the Dark!
customer_reviews.text: When baby is crying late at night I love that I can quickly find these in the dark! They are also great for when I am checking on baby late at night. If he has it in his mouth I can see where his face is and make sure he isn't face down, or hasn't pulled a blanket or his head or anything. Also! I have literally found lost ones by turning off the light in the house and just looking around! the glow lasts a long time, even though it does grow dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them, but water gets into the nipple
customer_reviews.text: Both my of my kids used and loved these pacifiers. Having glow in the dark ones were helpful at night, so they could find it easier at night in their crib. I have noticed though, that after a while, water can get into the nipple if you wash them, and then it's hard to get the water out. I feel like that's not supposed to happen. Regardless, these pacifiers were the only brand that my kids liked.
customer_reviews.author: AD22

customer_reviews.title: The only one my daughter will take
customer_reviews.text: these binky's are the best!! The glow in the dark feature really isn't a big deal... They only glow for so long as you would expect with all glow in the dark stuff... My daughter seems to be very picky with paci's and this is literally the only one she will take! Thank goodness I got a sample one in one of my free baby boxes, because after she took to it... we purchased more... She's 8 months now and this is STILL the only one she will take. Thank goodness we got so many because we seem to misplace them often.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Mold and bactira hazard
customer_reviews.text: I was so sad. My daughter LOVES these pacifiers. The first ones I got, water got into the nipple and I can hear her sucking and swallowing the air from the nipple. I thought and hoped it was a bad batch. The second set did the same thing. I am so sad because she really does prefer these! I just dont like that she is sucking on water and that condensation is trapped in there, a breeding ground for mold and bactira
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for going on three kids. For us, they are a great balance of value and quality. I don't have to worry about my kid being paci-addicted bc the shape doesn't just stick in their mouth without effort and they have weaned themselves off early. They last a good amount of time, while also being relatively inexpensive to replace. The only issue I have had is having water get into the bulb while cleaning, which is kinda annoying, but to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only pacifiers my little one will take - we tried Nuk, Soothies, Nanobebes, Jollypops, etc. but she spit every one of them out right away except for this one! It helps soothe her to sleep. Water can get trapped if you sanitize then using the case, but I just shake it out and let it air dry nipple facing up afterwards (or sanitize in the bottle warmer) and haven’t had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Success!
customer_reviews.text: If you have tried others and still no luck...try these and you will find success! I was getting desperate to find something to soothe my champion sucker. Not for food, purely for comfort would he want to suck all night long. Exhausted I ordered these late one night and haven’t looked back. The fact that they also glow in the dark is pure genius! The only reason I didn’t score perfect is while they glow, I can’t tell which side is the nipple and often end up grabbing that by mistake. Maybe not a big deal but just would have pushed it over the edge for me. So glad to have found this awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, handy pacifiers
customer_reviews.text: My baby took these at first and out of nowhere he started spitting them out and gagging on them. Now he won’t take them at all. I wish it worked for us but unfortunately I think he needs a different nipple shape (he’s breastfed so that may be why). I love that these glow in the dark. Only con is that water gets stuck inside pretty easily when you clean them, so you have to shake vigorously to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Water in the paci!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy and use these. Sterilized them in the microwave and then later gave to my 2 month old baby. My little one took to the paci quite quickly however I noticed water accumulating in the paci with no way to remove it! Fearful of mold and bacteria I had to throw it out. The second one had water within the nipple after sterilizing as well- so disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: MeggyD

customer_reviews.title: I love that they glow its so cool
customer_reviews.text: I love these things they glow so they are easy to find and my daughter has one in her mouth constantly even at 3 dont judge lol she went through a traumatic event at 2 years old and those become her comfort thing (our house burnt we lost everything) but yes I love them they are so cute strong and glow
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Prather

customer_reviews.title: Glow In the Dark is Great for Parents!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered MAM pacifiers for all three of my kids and MAM has the cutest designs and the glow in the dark function is awesome for parents. Kids can't really take advantage of it but for moms and dads who put their kids back to bed in the middle of the night really need this product. Not being able to find the pacifiers in the middle of the night is a pain in the you know what and if you turn on the bedroom light your kiddo will wake up! Highly recommend and our kids prefer the shape of this nipple versus other brands...
customer_reviews.author: Yule Park

customer_reviews.title: No more blindly searching for "lost" binky in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.text: Glow in the dark pacifiers may seem like an unnecessary gimmick... but please let me tell you: THEY ARE AMAZING. I can't tell you how many times we woke up to the cries of "where's my binky" and watching our son crawl around in his crib grasping in the dark trying to find something to calm him down. Even worse was when we went in, we were just as blind grabbing around and hoping to find one! These are amazing because he can find them himself... and when on the off chance he does struggle, we can find it too!
customer_reviews.author: b.g.

customer_reviews.title: Best pacifiers ever!
customer_reviews.text: My son did not want pacifiers at all. We tied different brands and he liked none, my husband decided to buy these and we are so glad we did because our son instantly took these pacifiers. He can now soothe himself back to sleep. Also I love how these don’t seem to get fuss and pet hair stuck on them like the other brands that seem to pick up anything the moment you set them down. These are made with a different material that keeps them clean. They come with a container for storage and to sterilize them in.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Rios

customer_reviews.title: Look Maam
customer_reviews.text: First, the glow in the dark feature is inspired. This has saved me from rooting around vainly in the dark on multiple occasions. My daughter took Nuk and I wish I had had this option. There is also no right-side-up to worry about and I haven't had any issues with water in the nipple like other varieties after cleaning. Somehow, the design of this paci seems to land right side up most of the time when dropped as well. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: April McGehee Azbill

customer_reviews.title: Love the Glow
customer_reviews.text: I love these! This brand is all my baby will take. The glow in the dark is great for finding the paci in the bassinet at night after the baby spits it out! It glows so good you can find it in pitch black darkness. The bad thing is that if you submerge it in water to wash it, water gets in and won’t get out. So don’t submerge!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite paci!
customer_reviews.text: My son has loved the Mam pacifiers since he was a newborn. They're the only ones he'll take! Comfortable, orthodontic, and lightweight. Perfect! I love the way they look.. they're quite cute, unlike some of the other orthodontic pacifiers on the market. The glow-in-the-dark feature is awesome. These glow almost all night! Very easy to find in my son's bassinet, even in the dark. I love to see the little glowing button when I look over at his bassinet at night. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: These are great for night time!
customer_reviews.text: We love the glow in the dark pacifiers at our house. I can't tell you what a lifesaver it is to walk into a crying baby's room in the middle of the night to easily see the pacifier in the crib and quickly get it back into baby's mouth - everyone is back to sleep quickly! Win! I steam clean them after every use and they have held up beautifully and are still lighting up!
customer_reviews.author: Mom To Twins

customer_reviews.title: Only pacifier my baby will take!
customer_reviews.text: My son hates pacifiers but man my nipples need a break sometimes, especially at night, we tried so many pacifiers and he just wouldn’t have it until we found these. He even keeps it in his mouth most of the night and therefore sleeps much longer in his crib. I love that they glow in the dark so I can easily find it when he does spit it out in the middle of the night. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for newborn and breastfed babies!
customer_reviews.text: Received a free one in a registry box and it’s the only pacifier my two week old would take bc he likes to suck to sooth. Hopped on amazon for more and loved that they offer the glow and the dark so purchased 4 more in case I lose one! Highly recommend. They are slightly smaller than the aven* which I like since he’s so tiny to begin with! I do breastfeed too.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pacifier for picky baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it from day one! I was using Chicco Natural Fit Orthodontic pacifier and that worked well from birth to 4+ months. If she didn't like a pacifier, she would spit it out so we went through 3 different pacifiers before using Chicco. When she turned 5 months, she started pulling the pacifier out using the handle and I wanted one without a handle so I got these. If she didn't like the pacifier, she would have spat it out, but she kept this one on. After getting MAM pacifier, whenever I gave her the Chicco pacifier again, she would spit it out and preferred the MAM pacifier. The glow in the dark feature is a wonderful bonus.
customer_reviews.author: kayni

customer_reviews.title: Life savers!
customer_reviews.text: OMG these pacifiers saved my life! For the longest time I thought my daughter outgrown her hospital pacifiers (Philips Avent) after a month because she would not take it. Whenever she cries, it's inconsolable. Until I found a MAM infant pacifier sample my friend gave me. Since then I bought everything MAM, including MAM bottles. I especially love these because they grow in the dark and it's very important when we tried to push the pacifier back in when she woke from nightmares.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hurt teeth development
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend for parents w/ toddlers who have anxiety when away from pacifiers-- doesn't hurt their teeth development & help keep them happy. I have hard time separating my todder fr her pacifier (she calls it "papa-tee') esp. when she has 2 ear-infections back to back bc the pacifier comforting to her. She would said "mama, my teeth miss something squishy--I'm really sad''...or..."I will not bite you mamma if you let me have my papa-tee"...LOL
customer_reviews.author: lxn01

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: So cute, baby loves the shape, but hard to keep clean. I have a perpetual barfer since day one and this is the only pacifier he would take. I’ve recently purchased these specific designs and since they’re kind of see-through, I noticed that his barf was stuck in the round front part! Eww! Had to throw it away. Also, when routinely washing, water and soap will get inside the nipple and could be hard to get out. Gonna try and switch him to a single piece pacifier that will be much easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle kekauoha

customer_reviews.title: Life savers!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I need to own stock in pacifier companies the way my son goes through these things! He’s been a mam paci guy since he was about a week old when I got tired of being his pacifier! These are great. But we have entered the stage of chewing the pacis. So I buy them a lot. Because once he’s chewed them he doesn’t want them anymore. But it takes a lot of chewing! He’s 2 years old and has all his teeth. Both my sons only take mam pacis. They are a total life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Binns - Craven

customer_reviews.title: Best from start to finish of your baby’s paci phase!
customer_reviews.text: Three babies and these are always my favorite. My only complaint is sometimes water gets inside when cleaning and it’s almost impossible to get out. Still worth it to buy them though. I love the glow in the dark when you’re trying to find it in their crib at night.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo608

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash
customer_reviews.text: These are great pacifiers - I've used them for both kids and they stay in their mouths better than other brands. Also being glow in the dark is wonderful for when the paci does fall out of their mouths in the night. The only negative is when I ran one through the dishwasher the nipple filled with dish water.. gross. I recommend hand washing and don't completely submerge in water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GrEAT BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 4 stars only because the “Glow in the Dark” doesn’t even show. Other than that these are as great as the MAM bottles ❤️ My son loves them even better than the Avent pacis. These don’t push or fall out of his mouth as easy and often as the others. The sterilization case is a plus!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna S

customer_reviews.title: Stays in and baby loves them
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They stay in baby’s mouth a lot easier than some brands with their c-curved design. Glows in the dark well so I can find them in the crib. My only negative comment would be the glow in the dark feature provides a lot of light in a pitch black room and I wonder if that makes it more difficult to sleep with a “night light” right on baby’s face
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite binky!
customer_reviews.text: We are preparing for baby number 2 and purchased these in advance because we love them so much! Favorite feature is that they flow in the dark, so are easy to find when your baby wakes up and cant find their binky. Must have in my opinion for parents with babies.
customer_reviews.author: Boyce Weber

customer_reviews.title: Weak glow ability.
customer_reviews.text: The pacifier is a favorite of my great niece that is with me every day. The glow doesn’t last all night though. It seems to glow better after being under artificial light rather than sunlight. That’s a bummer for me since I have my drapes open and don’t leave the lights on all day. Because they are almost clear, without the glow it’s hard to find in her bed!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: They pacify my baby.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, and they are literally the only pacifiers that my baby will take. Pacifiers are so highly subjective though, so your results may vary. I can attest though to the durability and ease of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: CatMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Water gets stuck in the pacifier.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointing with his pacifier since the water gets stuck inside the bulb and it’s very difficult to completely remove it. Also the plastic quality does not look as durable as the chicco and Phillips pacifiers I have used. The suction is also not as great as chicco orthodontic pacifier. I don’t recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: Favorite in our house
customer_reviews.text: These are my two year olds favorite pacis. The large circle makes them easy to hold. When washing water gets inside the nipples son you have to make sure it’s squeezed out to avoid mold growth. Caution the plastic nipple does break fairly easily if the child bites down in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Lu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these glow in the dark. I used ten with my daughter and now my son. When my daughter started sleeping in her own room, she was able to put the passi back in her mouth in the middle of the night! Mamas happy when mama can sleep!! Also it helps me quickly locate the passi in the middle of the night when my newborn wakes up in his bassinet. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mintz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love mam pacifiers. They fit great, has airways, and easy to suck on (not from my own personaly experience). My daughter takes to these. I love the fact that they are glow in the dark. When she's crying in the middle of night I can easily search for these in the dark without having to turn on the light. As she got older, she would see it in the dark and pluck it back into her own mouth - saves me from having to get up in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: bookfan

customer_reviews.title: best...binkies...ever
customer_reviews.text: little one loves these! After our first kid, plus this one's poo-pooing the hospital binks, I knew binks would be a matter of preference. I purchased 4-5 different styles from the-mart and we tested them over a few days. He didn't like any of them except these MAM ones...
customer_reviews.author: Rickerish

customer_reviews.title: Great, especially at night!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our Mam's and so does our daughter! She is a breastfed baby. I'm not sure if those makes a difference but for those that do breastfeed, there has never been any nipple confusion while using these. We tried several pacifiers and this one is definitely her preferred pacifier. It's also amazing at night. If she ends up losing it in her crib, we don't have to turn her light on to give it to her when she wakes up crying which is a life saver! We would definitely recommend these pacifiers!
customer_reviews.author: Bran712

customer_reviews.title: Best Pacifiers!
customer_reviews.text: MAM is the only brand of pacifier my son would take since birth. He had a small mouth as he was under 6 lbs when he was born and while others seemed to be too big, these worked for him. They are great quality and have lasted through tons of steam sterilizations and dishwasher loads. I especially like that these glow in the dark because it makes it easy to find during the night when he wakes up crying after it has popped out.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Pacifier ring
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves these pacifiers, it's the only brand that he wants. The only cons for me it's that you need to buy the ring for the clip holder, because if you our it direct to the pacifier the string will be in his face and could irritated his skin.
customer_reviews.author: M.Ross

customer_reviews.title: Bless the person who invented glow in the dark pacifiers
customer_reviews.text: We heard all the stories about kids preferring one brand of pacifiers so we bought a couple of each of the most popular and MAMs stuck. But the best part is the fact that they flow in the dark. When your kid is fussing and you’re not wearing glasses or contacts just having to insert the glowing circle back into a mouth is a game changer. The only problem we have now is finding his mouth as it does not glow in the dark ;)
customer_reviews.author: kershels

customer_reviews.title: Love the MAM products. These are very good!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pacifiers. The container is great for travel and it's used for sterilizing any two of the MAM brand pacifiers. The only flaw in the design is that there isn't much airflow up against the outer mouth. The holes should be slightly bigger so that moisture (drool) isn't trapped there, causing irritation. We use the "air" design now for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Mil

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has only taken the Mam pacifier. She would not take any other brand. I love that the nipple is same shape no matter the size of pacifier. She has never gotten a rash around her mouth from having these. They are very easy to clean and are very durable. We have bought these multiple times and will continue. Wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: Twinkle twinkle little star
customer_reviews.text: The only pacifier my baby wants and the coolest part is that the shine in the dark and i can find it easy without turning the light on. My nurse told me that they are the best pacifiers and that she has had the best luck with them over the years.
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Watch the sizing / great paci
customer_reviews.text: I Like these. I Like the glow in dark feature. Only Suggestion is that the size is 0-6 months, 6-12 months etc. i have a big baby ( 6 weeks and 12 lbs, born 10lbs) and he couldn’t keep the 0-6 month paci in mouth. We got the 6-12 month and he took right away. I think 0-6 month is a large gap in age and the pack is quite small. I would say good for average size newborns up until 3 months max. Then i would think go up size.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Eizember

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my 6 month old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 6-18 month size for my 6 month old. It was too big for her face. The top part was too close to her nose for me to feel comfortable having her sleep with them. Not sure how long you are to keep it by the light to keep the glow all night. I held it close to a light bulb for about 30 seconds around 7:30 pm and it was out by 1am. My baby loves Avent pacifiers and took to this one easily. Didn’t spit it out like others I’ve tried with her. I think once she grows into it I will give it a try again.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: The best pacifiers out there!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for all 3 of my kids now. Although it sounds silly, the glow in the dark effect really is useful. I love that they can go in the babies mouth either way and my babies always seemed to take these better/ be able to latch on better than traditional pacifiers.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S

customer_reviews.title: THE. BEST. THING. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: MAM’s glow in the dark pacifiers are THE. BEST. THING. EVER. A few minutes in the light (any light; artificial or by the sun) and they’ll glow beautifully! My baby can find it in his crib at night and put it back in his mouth when he needs it which is great so I don’t have to get up and find it for him ;) also helpful to find in the dark when I check on him and put them back in his crib when they fall. I keep 2 in his crib and one in his car seat at all times! Plus they’re super cute, not too cheesy, and a great color! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Hox Family

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Paci!
customer_reviews.text: We love our MAM pacifiers in this house! The glow in the dark feature is wonderful and helps me to not fumble around in the dark looking for it when my daughter is upset. The designs are always so cute and my daughter has no problem holding onto these or even placing them back into her mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Sydnee Cissna

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: So I totally didn't expect much from these but wow! My son went to sleep around 11 pm with this pacifier and it was noticeably lit until almost 8 am! I have no idea what voodoo magic they put in this glow in the dark pacifier but it's awesome! My little guy drops his pacifier every 5 minutes during the night then proceeds to freak out until I find it in the dark and attempt to search for his mouth so this helps out A LOT!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Buy all glow pacifiers; even for daytime use!
customer_reviews.text: The glow pacifiers are the best. Seriously, I wish I would have gotten ALL glow/night pacifiers. They look like regular pacifiers during the day, but then they GLOW at night! It would have prevented me from doing the constant, "Ok, it's time for a nap/overnight sleep... where are the night pacifiers?..." The glowing lasts about 6 hours for us. But even when the glowing stops, they're still lighter in color and easier to find in the dark than the clear version.
customer_reviews.author: Trillium03

customer_reviews.title: Breastfed baby
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 2 months old and EBF. She started off with the newborn pacifier and then I ordered these. I love how they glow in the dark so I can find them in the middle of the night. I just don’t know how to get the water out completely so I really had to shake them and wait for them to dry out after I boiled them. Other then that they’re great and my baby accepts them no problem
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S

customer_reviews.title: Easier to hold on to than Soothies
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 week old started out on Soothies since that was the WubbaNub brand, but I was uncomfortable with having a stuffed animal in her bed at night and she spit out the Soothies constantly, resulting in whines and cries all night long. We ordered the MAM pacifiers after googling solutions, and they are a lot easier for her to keep in her mouth while sleeping, although not foolproof. Four stars because the glow in the dark feature is only so-so -they must be "charged" regularly through exposure to light and the glow does not last through the night.
customer_reviews.author: songofjoy00711

customer_reviews.title: cute, but I wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I liked that these would have been easy to find at night. Unfortunately, my son did not like them whatsoever. The nipple is very rounded and bulky. Also, the shap of the plastic part ofvthe pacifier is not compatible to my baby's face. He is 9 months old and it was still big, smashing his nose. They came in a package that states to add water to a designated line and place in the microwave for 3 minutes to sanitize the pacifier, however after 1 minute, there were popping noises coming from my microwave and the water was already half gone.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMommyOfBoys

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got these because my baby isn't very good at keeping pacifiers in her mouth. These ones she loved for some reason! I like the fact that you can "charge" them during the day and at night the glow lasts almost allll night! The only downside to these is that you cant hook those stuffed animal things onto these. but it came with a cool little carrying case
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t glow for us
customer_reviews.text: These are the only pacifiers my baby will take. Occasionally they get water inside the nipple and we have to toss them. Also, they don’t really glow in the dark. I imagine it’s because we live in Alaska and there’s not a lot of light the pacifiers are getting this time of year, but thought it was worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome pacifiers
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this pacifier is that I can still monitor my infant in the dark as I can see the baby "chomping" on this while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Nishanth

customer_reviews.title: They are absolutely the best pacifier I ever met
customer_reviews.text: I had them when my two sons were young. Now I purchase some more for my pregnant friends! They are absolutely the best pacifier I ever met! I used to woke up in the middle of night to help my son find his pacifier. However, after I gave this to him, I don't need to wake up so many times at night because he can find his pacifier all by himself! Very impressive. Saved my life.
customer_reviews.author: Yini Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great pacifier
customer_reviews.text: My boy's favorite pacifiers! He has used these since birth as they are the only ones he will take. You do have to read the directions about cleaning as water can get stuck inside the nipple. But it is a really easy fix!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Faint glow but powerful pacifier!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine as a pacifier but ours don't glow all night long. The only way I see it glowing like it is in the photo is if you put it near a black light for a few hours or leave it out on a sunny day. Otherwise it is very faint. We got this more for the glowing aspect but I got rid of my black lights in the 90's. Also the sun doesn't shine on our house because of the swarm of giant eagles flying around looking for Gandalf.
customer_reviews.author: Darin G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these pacifiers. They're the only ones my daughter likes. I dont really understand why the girls are more expensive than the girls. 🙄
customer_reviews.author: shea  morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great product & price
customer_reviews.text: Great price!!!!!! Glow in the dark is great for the bed, easy to find glows all night, not too bright, just enough to see where there baby don't wake up due to me not being able to find it and get it back to her quick enough! Cheaper than buying at Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Baby’s favorite pacifier.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using these pacifiers since she was born. It’s the ONLY kind she takes to. They came as I expected, and shipping was on time like always. Great pacifiers. Super cute. Not to mention when baby is sleeping without the lights on the glowing of the pacifier really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Glow in the dark is a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: My son will only take mam brand pacifiers, I'm just sorry I didn't find the glow in the dark ones earlier! These are seriously a game changer when you're looking for the pacifier in the crib in the middle of the night, and you have a screaming baby. This is brilliant and these are the only ones I will buy from now on
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Favorite binkies!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only pacifiers our baby will use. I love that they’re glow in the dark, it makes it so easy to find them at night - but they’re not bright enough to keep him awake. It’s easy for gunk to get underneath the knob, so you have to scrub pretty hard to get it
customer_reviews.author: Brynn C.

product_meta.title: MAM Night Pacifiers (2 Count), MAM Pacifiers 6+ Months, Best Pacifier for Breastfed Babies, Glow in the Dark Pacifier, Baby Boy Pacifier
product_meta.description: Color:BoyNo more frustration trying to find your lost pacifiers at night! The buttons on these baby boy night pacifiers glow in the dark, making them easy for baby and parent to find at night. BPA/BPS-free MAM Night Pacifiers were developed by leading pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies age 6+ months.* These pacifiers combine technological innovation and trendsetting design to help give babies a healthy start in life. MAM pacifiers feature an innovative nipple designed to promote healthy oral development so you can soothe your baby with confidence. Baby will love latching onto the soothing pacifier nipple that, with the help of a built-in air channel, naturally flattens and extends when sucked, mimicking a human nipple during breastfeeding. And all MAM pacifiers are orthodontic, featuring a symmetrical nipple that fits perfectly in baby’s mouth at any angle. MAM’s medically engineered nipples all feature life-like, SkinSoft textured silicone that feels just like mom. With multiple pacifier shapes and nipple sizes to pick from, MAM nipples are easily accepted by babies of all ages, with 94% nipple acceptance among babies tested.** Babies simply love the ease and comfort of latching onto MAM nipples. *Developed in conjunction with the International Children’s Medical Research Society. ** Market Research 2009-2017, tested with 1,508 babies.
feature_bullets: GLOWS AT NIGHT - These night pacifiers glow in the dark, making it easy for you to locate quickly at night without any stumbling and searching, so baby can sleep better.
COMFORTABLE DESIGN – These cute pacifiers for babies are fun and functional. The curved shield with wide openings keep baby comfortable and allow baby’s skin to breathe.
SILICONE NIPPLE – The BPA-free silicone nipple is a signature MAM pacifier design, with silky SkinSoft material and a symmetrical shape that's ideal for jaw and teeth development.
STERILIZING STORAGE CASE - Add water and pop into the microwave to sterilize MAM pacifiers in just 3 minutes. No separate sterilizer means fewer baby items to take on the go!
PRODUCT DETAILS – MAM Night Pacifiers, 6+ Months, 2-Count Baby Boy Pacifiers, Sterilizing Pacifier Holder
